etymology.description: Depicts a snake coiled around a branch
etymology.interpretation: The character 巴(bā, "to cling") originally depicted a snake wrapped around a branch or object, symbolizing the idea of clinging or sticking to something.

examples.chinese: 她总是巴着妈妈(她總是巴著媽媽)。
examples.english: She always clings to her mother.

examples.chinese: 巴先生今天出席会议(巴先生今天出席會議)，分享成功经验(分享成功經驗)。
examples.pinyin: Bā xiānshēng jīntiān chūxí huìyì, fēnxiǎng chénggōng jīngyàn.
examples.english: Mr. Ba attended the meeting today, sharing his success experience.
